attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to stop people who use flying like a bus ,or the more you fly the more tax you pay or ban flying NOW stop all new airports and yes it will be hard for people who have jobs in the flying industry but if we carry on nobody will have a planet to live on .

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
